distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libqb fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-39976: Fixed potential buffer overflow with long log messages (bsc#1214066).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: log_blackbox.c in libqb before 2.0.8 allows a buffer overflow via long log messages because the header size is not considered.
notes.title: CVE description
